description: Permanently deletes the specified Elasticsearch domain and all of its data. Once a domain is deleted, it cannot be recovered.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The name of the Elasticsearch domain that you want to permanently delete.

nested_items.name: DomainStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the Elasticsearch domain being deleted.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the specified Elasticsearch domain.

nested_items.name: DomainName
nested_items.description: The name of an Elasticsearch domain. Domain names are unique across the domains owned by an account within an AWS region. Domain names start with a letter or number and can contain the following characters: a-z (lowercase), 0-9, and - (hyphen).

nested_items.name: ARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon resource name (ARN) of an Elasticsearch domain. See Identifiers for IAM Entities in Using AWS Identity and Access Management for more information.

nested_items.name: Created
nested_items.description: The domain creation status. True if the creation of an Elasticsearch domain is complete. False if domain creation is still in progress.

nested_items.name: Deleted
nested_items.description: The domain deletion status. True if a delete request has been received for the domain but resource cleanup is still in progress. False if the domain has not been deleted. Once domain deletion is complete, the status of the domain is no longer returned.

nested_items.name: Endpoint
nested_items.description: The Elasticsearch domain endpoint that you use to submit index and search requests.

nested_items.name: Endpoints
nested_items.description: Map containing the Elasticsearch domain endpoints used to submit index and search requests. Example key, value: 'vpc','vpc-endpoint-h2dsd34efgyghrtguk5gt6j2foh4.us-east-1.es.amazonaws.com'.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Processing
nested_items.description: The status of the Elasticsearch domain configuration. True if Amazon Elasticsearch Service is processing configuration changes. False if the configuration is active.

nested_items.name: UpgradeProcessing
nested_items.description: The status of an Elasticsearch domain version upgrade. True if Amazon Elasticsearch Service is undergoing a version upgrade. False if the configuration is active.

nested_items.name: ElasticsearchClusterConfig
nested_items.description: The type and number of instances in the domain cluster.

nested_items.name: InstanceType
nested_items.description: The instance type for an Elasticsearch cluster. UltraWarm instance types are not supported for data instances.

nested_items.name: InstanceCount
nested_items.description: The number of instances in the specified domain cluster.

nested_items.name: DedicatedMasterEnabled
nested_items.description: A boolean value to indicate whether a dedicated master node is enabled. See About Dedicated Master Nodes for more information.

nested_items.name: ZoneAwarenessEnabled
nested_items.description: A boolean value to indicate whether zone awareness is enabled. See About Zone Awareness for more information.

nested_items.name: ZoneAwarenessConfig
nested_items.description: Specifies the zone awareness configuration for a domain when zone awareness is enabled.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZoneCount
nested_items.description: An integer value to indicate the number of availability zones for a domain when zone awareness is enabled. This should be equal to number of subnets if VPC endpoints is enabled.

nested_items.name: DedicatedMasterType
nested_items.description: The instance type for a dedicated master node.

nested_items.name: DedicatedMasterCount
nested_items.description: Total number of dedicated master nodes, active and on standby, for the cluster.

nested_items.name: WarmEnabled
nested_items.description: True to enable warm storage.

nested_items.name: WarmType
nested_items.description: The instance type for the Elasticsearch cluster's warm nodes.

nested_items.name: WarmCount
nested_items.description: The number of warm nodes in the cluster.

nested_items.name: ColdStorageOptions
nested_items.description: Specifies the ColdStorageOptions config for Elasticsearch Domain.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Enable cold storage option. Accepted values true or false.

nested_items.name: EBSOptions
nested_items.description: The EBSOptions for the specified domain. See Configuring EBS-based Storage for more information.

nested_items.name: EBSEnabled
nested_items.description: Specifies whether EBS-based storage is enabled.

nested_items.name: VolumeType
nested_items.description: Specifies the volume type for EBS-based storage.

nested_items.name: VolumeSize
nested_items.description: Integer to specify the size of an EBS volume.

nested_items.name: Iops
nested_items.description: Specifies the IOPS for Provisioned IOPS And GP3 EBS volume (SSD).

nested_items.name: Throughput
nested_items.description: Specifies the Throughput for GP3 EBS volume (SSD).

nested_items.name: AccessPolicies
nested_items.description: IAM access policy as a JSON-formatted string.

nested_items.name: SnapshotOptions
nested_items.description: Specifies the status of the SnapshotOptions.

nested_items.name: AutomatedSnapshotStartHour
nested_items.description: Specifies the time, in UTC format, when the service takes a daily automated snapshot of the specified Elasticsearch domain. Default value is 0 hours.

nested_items.name: VPCOptions
nested_items.description: The VPCOptions for the specified domain. For more information, see VPC Endpoints for Amazon Elasticsearch Service Domains.

nested_items.name: VPCId
nested_items.description: The VPC Id for the Elasticsearch domain. Exists only if the domain was created with VPCOptions.

nested_items.name: SubnetIds
nested_items.description: Specifies the subnets for VPC endpoint.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZones
nested_items.description: The availability zones for the Elasticsearch domain. Exists only if the domain was created with VPCOptions.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_items.description: Specifies the security groups for VPC endpoint.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: CognitoOptions
nested_items.description: The CognitoOptions for the specified domain. For more information, see Amazon Cognito Authentication for Kibana.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies the option to enable Cognito for Kibana authentication.

nested_items.name: UserPoolId
nested_items.description: Specifies the Cognito user pool ID for Kibana authentication.

nested_items.name: IdentityPoolId
nested_items.description: Specifies the Cognito identity pool ID for Kibana authentication.

nested_items.name: RoleArn
nested_items.description: Specifies the role ARN that provides Elasticsearch permissions for accessing Cognito resources.

nested_items.name: EncryptionAtRestOptions
nested_items.description: Specifies the status of the EncryptionAtRestOptions.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specifies the option to enable Encryption At Rest.

nested_items.name: KmsKeyId
nested_items.description: Specifies the KMS Key ID for Encryption At Rest options.

nested_items.name: NodeToNodeEncryptionOptions
nested_items.description: Specifies the status of the NodeToNodeEncryptionOptions.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: Specify true to enable node-to-node encryption.

nested_items.name: AdvancedOptions
nested_items.description: Specifies the status of the AdvancedOptions.
(string) ---
(string) ---

nested_items.name: LogPublishingOptions
nested_items.description: Log publishing options for the given domain.

nested_items.name: CloudWatchLogsLogGroupArn
nested_items.description: (string) ---
INDEX_SLOW_LOGS: Index slow logs contain insert requests that took more time than configured index query log threshold to execute.
SEARCH_SLOW_LOGS: Search slow logs contain search queries that took more time than configured search query log threshold to execute.
ES_APPLICATION_LOGS: Elasticsearch application logs contain information about errors and warnings raised during the operation of the service and can be useful for troubleshooting.
AUDIT_LOGS: Audit logs contain records of user requests for access from the domain.

nested_items.name: ServiceSoftwareOptions
nested_items.description: The current status of the Elasticsearch domain's service software.

nested_items.name: CurrentVersion
nested_items.description: The current service software version that is present on the domain.

nested_items.name: NewVersion
nested_items.description: The new service software version if one is available.

nested_items.name: UpdateAvailable
nested_items.description: True if you are able to update you service software version. False if you are not able to update your service software version.

nested_items.name: Cancellable
nested_items.description: True if you are able to cancel your service software version update. False if you are not able to cancel your service software version.

nested_items.name: UpdateStatus
nested_items.description: The status of your service software update. This field can take the following values: ELIGIBLE, PENDING_UPDATE, IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, and NOT_ELIGIBLE.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the UpdateStatus.

nested_items.name: AutomatedUpdateDate
nested_items.description: Timestamp, in Epoch time, until which you can manually request a service software update. After this date, we automatically update your service software.

nested_items.name: OptionalDeployment
nested_items.description: True if a service software is never automatically updated. False if a service software is automatically updated after AutomatedUpdateDate.

nested_items.name: DomainEndpointOptions
nested_items.description: The current status of the Elasticsearch domain's endpoint options.

nested_items.name: EnforceHTTPS
nested_items.description: Specify if only HTTPS endpoint should be enabled for the Elasticsearch domain.

nested_items.name: TLSSecurityPolicy
nested_items.description: Specify the TLS security policy that needs to be applied to the HTTPS endpoint of Elasticsearch domain. It can be one of the following values:

nested_items.name: CustomEndpointEnabled
nested_items.description: Specify if custom endpoint should be enabled for the Elasticsearch domain.

nested_items.name: CustomEndpoint
nested_items.description: Specify the fully qualified domain for your custom endpoint.

nested_items.name: CustomEndpointCertificateArn
nested_items.description: Specify ACM certificate ARN for your custom endpoint.

nested_items.name: AdvancedSecurityOptions
nested_items.description: The current status of the Elasticsearch domain's advanced security options.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: True if advanced security is enabled.

nested_items.name: InternalUserDatabaseEnabled
nested_items.description: True if the internal user database is enabled.

nested_items.name: SAMLOptions
nested_items.description: Describes the SAML application configured for a domain.

nested_items.name: Enabled
nested_items.description: True if SAML is enabled.

nested_items.name: MetadataContent
nested_items.description: The Metadata of the SAML application in xml format.

nested_items.name: EntityId
nested_items.description: The unique Entity ID of the application in SAML Identity Provider.

nested_items.name: SubjectKey
nested_items.description: The key used for matching the SAML Subject attribute.

nested_items.name: RolesKey
nested_items.description: The key used for matching the SAML Roles attribute.

nested_items.name: SessionTimeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: The duration, in minutes, after which a user session becomes inactive.

nested_items.name: AnonymousAuthDisableDate
nested_items.description: Specifies the Anonymous Auth Disable Date when Anonymous Auth is enabled.

nested_items.name: AnonymousAuthEnabled
nested_items.description: True if Anonymous auth is enabled. Anonymous auth can be enabled only when AdvancedSecurity is enabled on existing domains.

nested_items.name: AutoTuneOptions
nested_items.description: The current status of the Elasticsearch domain's Auto-Tune options.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: Specifies the AutoTuneState for the Elasticsearch domain.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: Specifies the error message while enabling or disabling the Auto-Tune.

nested_items.name: ChangeProgressDetails
nested_items.description: Specifies change details of the domain configuration change.

nested_items.name: ChangeId
nested_items.description: The unique change identifier associated with a specific domain configuration change.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Contains an optional message associated with the domain configuration change.

nested_items.name: ConfigChangeStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the configuration change.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time that the configuration change was initiated, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The last time that the configuration change was updated.

nested_items.name: InitiatedBy
nested_items.description: The IAM principal who initiated the configuration change.

nested_items.name: DomainProcessingStatus
nested_items.description: The status of any changes that are currently in progress for the domain.

nested_items.name: ModifyingProperties
nested_items.description: Information about the domain properties that are currently being modified.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the property that is currently being modified.

nested_items.name: ActiveValue
nested_items.description: The current value of the domain property that is being modified.

nested_items.name: PendingValue
nested_items.description: The value that the property that is currently being modified will eventually have.

nested_items.name: ValueType
nested_items.description: The type of value that is currently being modified. Properties can have two types:
